items.title: Was Jim Cramer Right About Salesforce, Inc. (CRM)?
items.description: We recently published a list of 13 Stock Predictions That Jim Cramer Got Completely Wrong. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discusses. During a recent episode of Mad Money, which aired on Monday, the 5th of May, Jim Cramer gave some […]
